billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

title: Requires the New York state tourism website to be displayed in any advertisement or public service announcement funded by state money
summary: Requires the New York state tourism website to be displayed in any advertisement or public service announcement funded by state money.
currentCommittee: CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
actClause: AN ACT requiring the placement of the New York State tourism website on any advertisement or public service announcement funded with state money
